channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Cognos Analytics
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Cognos Analytics

item.title: CVE-2022-38708|2024-08-03T11:02:14.466Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7 11.2.0, and 11.2.1 could be vulnerable to a Server-Side Request Forgery Attack (SSRF) attack by constructing URLs from user-controlled data. This could enable attackers to make arbitrary requests to the internal network or to the local file system. IBM X-Force ID: 234180.

item.title: CVE-2021-20470|2024-08-03T17:37:24.333Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7 and 11.2.0 does not require that users should have strong passwords by default, which makes it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 196339.

item.title: CVE-2022-39160|2024-08-03T11:10:32.638Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.1, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 235064.

item.title: CVE-2021-20493|2024-08-03T17:45:44.475Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7 and 11.2.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 197794.

item.title: CVE-2021-20468|2024-08-03T17:37:24.186Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.2.1 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 196825.

item.title: CVE-2022-43883|2024-08-03T13:40:06.596Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.2.1 could be vulnerable to a Log Injection attack by constructing URLs from user-controlled data. This could enable attackers to make arbitrary requests to the internal network or to the local file system. IBM X-Force ID: 240266.

item.title: CVE-2022-30614|2024-08-03T06:56:13.095Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.2.1 is vulnerable to a denial of service via email flooding caused by sending a specially-crafted request. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to consume all available CPU resources. IBM X-Force ID: 227591.

item.title: CVE-2022-43887|2024-08-03T13:40:06.582Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.2.1 could be vulnerable to sensitive information exposure by passing API keys to log files. If these keys contain sensitive information, it could lead to further attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 240450.

item.title: CVE-2021-20464|2024-08-03T17:37:24.238Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics PowerPlay (IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7) could be vulnerable to an XML Bomb attack by a malicious authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 196813.

item.title: CVE-2021-20461|2024-08-03T17:37:24.332Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 10.0 and 11.1 is susceptible to a weakness in the implementation of the System Appearance configuration setting. An attacker could potentially bypass business logic to modify the appearance and behavior of the application. IBM X-Force ID: 196770.

item.title: CVE-2022-36773|2024-08-03T10:14:28.369Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.2.1 is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 233571.

item.title: CVE-2022-34357|2024-08-03T09:07:16.134Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics Mobile Server 11.1.7, 11.2.4, and 12.0.0 is vulnerable to Denial of Service due to due to weak or absence of rate limiting. By making unlimited http requests, it is possible for a single user to exhaust server resources over a period of time making service unavailable for other legitimate users. IBM X-Force ID: 230510.

item.title: CVE-2023-30996|2024-08-02T14:45:24.402Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.4, and 12.0.0 could be vulnerable to information leakage due to unverified sources in messages sent between Windows objects of different origins. IBM X-Force ID: 254290.

item.title: CVE-2023-30996|2024-07-12T22:32:20.693Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.4, and 12.0.0 could be vulnerable to information leakage due to unverified sources in messages sent between Windows objects of different origins. IBM X-Force ID: 254290.

item.title: CVE-2024-25053|2024-07-01T20:57:36.747Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0, 11.2.1, 11.2.2, 11.2.3, 11.2.4, 12.0.0, 12.0.1, and 12.0.2 is vulnerable to improper certificate validation when using the IBM Planning Analytics Data Source Connection. This could allow an attacker to spoof a trusted entity by interfering in the communication path between IBM Planning Analytics server and IBM Cognos Analytics server. IBM X-Force ID: 283364.

item.title: CVE-2024-25041|2024-06-28T18:55:55.233Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0, 11.2.1, 11.2.2, 11.2.3, 11.2.4, 12.0.0, 12.0.1, and 12.0.2 is potentially vulnerable to cross site scripting (XSS). A remote attacker could execute malicious commands due to improper validation of column headings in Cognos Assistant. IBM X-Force ID: 282780.

item.title: CVE-2024-25053|2024-06-28T18:53:48.828Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0, 11.2.1, 11.2.2, 11.2.3, 11.2.4, 12.0.0, 12.0.1, and 12.0.2 is vulnerable to improper certificate validation when using the IBM Planning Analytics Data Source Connection. This could allow an attacker to spoof a trusted entity by interfering in the communication path between IBM Planning Analytics server and IBM Cognos Analytics server. IBM X-Force ID: 283364.

item.title: CVE-2022-34357|2024-02-24T15:38:49.771Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics Mobile Server 11.1.7, 11.2.4, and 12.0.0 is vulnerable to Denial of Service due to due to weak or absence of rate limiting. By making unlimited http requests, it is possible for a single user to exhaust server resources over a period of time making service unavailable for other legitimate users. IBM X-Force ID: 230510.

item.title: CVE-2024-25047|2024-05-02T20:09:21.479Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0 through 11.2.4 and 12.0.0 through 12.0.2 is vulnerable to injection attacks in application logging by not sanitizing user provided data. This could lead to further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 282956.

item.title: CVE-2023-38359|2024-02-24T15:27:07.898Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.4, and 12.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 260744.

item.title: CVE-2024-25047|2024-06-04T17:35:50.331Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0 through 11.2.4 and 12.0.0 through 12.0.2 is vulnerable to injection attacks in application logging by not sanitizing user provided data. This could lead to further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 282956.

item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.4, and 12.0.0 could be vulnerable to information leakage due to unverified sources in messages sent between Windows objects of different origins. IBM X-Force ID: 254290.

item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.4, and 12.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. IBM X-Force ID: 267451.

item.title: CVE-2023-32344|2024-02-24T15:29:33.526Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.4, and 12.0.0 is vulnerable to form action hijacking where it is possible to modify the form action to reference an arbitrary path. IBM X-Force ID: 255898.

A remote attacker could execute malicious commands due to improper validation of column headings in Cognos Assistant. IBM X-Force ID: 282780.
